post.text:
The decision we make in four days will affect our country for decades. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

Share this if you agree:

comment.author: Brandhi
comment.text: THIS above all else is why I'm with her!!! Trump has made promises to the Christian extremists and evangelicals that he will appoint justices that will push anti lgbt policy and anti women's rights policy. This is not who were are! Let's move America forward into the 21st century, not back to the 20th century! Stronger TOGETHER! That includes you Trumpites, we will welcome you to our America to!

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: let's just say, for the sake of argument, that you are right and hillary DOES manage to cheat her way to a win. she is currently under FBI investigation for treason AND for pay to play with her "foundation". so her legal problems will prevent her from performing the duties of a sitting president. she will be impeached, just as her husband was in the 90's. then kaine will take over. now, that might sound like a horror story to some of us trump supporters; BUT it's not really........because the House and Senate will be republican still. so neither Crooked nor Creepy will be able to destroy america. WOMEN FOR TRUMP!

replies.author: Brandhi
replies.text: Austin so your just gonna ignore Trump's upcoming rape trial and fraud trial? A president elect sitting in a court room for rape??? Your a special kind of stupid. Over a year and how many millions spent by the FBI and they got nothing. Now we find out the FBI highly favors Trump and is leading details of active cases? üòÅüòÅüòÅ

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Brandhi darling, trump HAS no "upcoming rape trial and fraud trial". if he did, don't you think Crooked and her surrogates would be all over it? as to you people welcoming us "trumpites" to your america.............spare me the condescending BS. your candidate, EVEN if she happens to cheat her way in, will be impeached just as her husband was. either way, she will never truly be president.

replies.author: Brandhi
replies.text: Lol Austin I just tossed it at Google and this was a top result. Bloomberg article.... http://www.bloomberg.com/politics/articles/2016-09-15/trump-university-trial-to-go-ahead-in-november-as-delay-rejected

replies.author: Brandhi
replies.text: December 16th, rape case goes in front of a judge... https://www.google.com/amp/people.com/politics/donald-trump-rape-lawsuit-accuser-raped-13/amp/
